Object.Name: CmdhDefEcValues
Object.Description1: This Object represents default set of values for the Event Category parameter of an incoming request or response message.

Item.Name: Order
Item.Description: Contains an index defining the order of processing this CmdhDefEcValue Object Instance will be handled

Item.Name: DefEcValue
Item.Description: Represents the default Event category value to be applied when the conditions given in this Object Instance are matched

Item.Name: RequestOrigin
Item.Description: List of zero or more Local AE-IDs, App-IDs, or the strings “localAE” or “thisCSE”

Item.Name: RequestContext
Item.Description: Contains the requestContext information of this Object Instance which needs to be matched

Item.Name: RequestContextNotification
Item.Description: Contains true/false flag indicating whether or not notification procedures apply.

Item.Name: RequestCharacteristics
Item.Description: Represents conditions pertaining to the request itself, (e.g. the requested Response Type ) than needs to be matched
